mapper.sql: id, site, channel, title, shortTitle, titleColor, titleBlod, source, author, description, tags, img, url, attchs, addtime, templet, isTop,ishot,isimgs, topEndTime, clickNum, addUser,state,issign, iscomment,video,indexnum,opentype,opentimetype,openendtime,htmlIndexnum

i.id, i.site, i.channel, i.title, i.shortTitle, i.titleColor, i.titleBlod, i.source, i.author, i.description, i.tags, i.img, i.url, i.attchs, i.addtime, i.templet, i.isTop,i.ishot,i.isimgs, i.topEndTime, i.clickNum, i.addUser,i.state,i.issign, i.iscomment,i.video,i.indexnum,i.opentype,i.opentimetype,i.openendtime,i.htmlIndexnum
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from freecms_info i
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
,c.pagemark channelPagemark,c.indexnum channelIndexnum from freecms_info i left join freecms_channel c on i.channel=c.id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
, ,c.pagemark channelPagemark,c.indexnum channelIndexnum FROM freecms_info i left join freecms_channel c on i.channel=c.id where i.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id,clicknum from freecms_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into freecms_info (id, site, channel, title, shortTitle, titleColor, titleBlod, source, author, description, tags, img, url, attchs, addtime, templet, isTop,ishot,isimgs, topEndTime, clickNum, addUser,state,issign,iscomment,video, indexnum,opentype, opentimetype,openendtime,content ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shorttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleblod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attchs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{templet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{istop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ishot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clicknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{iscomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{opentype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{opentimetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} )

mapper.select: select count(*) from freecms_info i

SELECT top ${pageSize} COUNT(i.id) AS countnum ,adduser,max(u.loginname) addUserLoginName,max(u.name) addUserName FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_users u ON i.adduser=u.id
GROUP BY adduser ORDER BY countnum desc

SELECT COUNT(i.id) AS countnum ,adduser,max(u.loginname) addUserLoginName,max(u.name) addUserName FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_users u ON i.adduser=u.id
GROUP BY adduser ORDER BY countnum desc

SELECT top ${pageSize} COUNT(i.id) countnum,max(site) site,max(s.name) sitename FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_site s ON i.site=s.id
GROUP BY site ORDER BY countnum desc

SELECT COUNT(i.id) countnum,max(site) site,max(s.name) sitename FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_site s ON i.site=s.id
GROUP BY site ORDER BY countnum desc

SELECT COUNT(i.id) countnum,max(channel) channel,max(c.name) channelname FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_channel c ON i.channel=c.id
GROUP BY i.channel ORDER BY countnum desc
SELECT COUNT(distinct adduser) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_users u ON i.adduser=u.id
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_users u ON i.adduser=u.id
SELECT COUNT(distinct site) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_site s ON i.site=s.id
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_site s ON i.site=s.id
SELECT COUNT(distinct channel) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_channel c ON i.channel=c.id
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i LEFT JOIN freecms_channel c ON i.channel=c.id

SELECT top ${pageSize} COUNT(id) countnum,year(ADDTIME) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY year(ADDTIME)

SELECT COUNT(id) countnum,year(ADDTIME) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY year(ADDTIME)
SELECT COUNT(distinct year(addtime)) FROM freecms_info i
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i

SELECT top ${pageSize} COUNT(id) countnum,(cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))

SELECT COUNT(id) countnum,(cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))
SELECT COUNT(distinct (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))) FROM freecms_info i
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i

SELECT top ${pageSize} COUNT(id) countnum,(cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))+'-'+cast(day(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))+'-'+cast(day(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))

SELECT COUNT(id) countnum,(cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))+'-'+cast(day(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))+'-'+cast(day(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))
SELECT COUNT(distinct (cast(year(ADDTIME) as varchar(4))+'-'+cast(month(ADDTIME) as varchar(2))+'-'+cast(day(ADDTIME) as varchar(2)))) FROM freecms_info i
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM freecms_info i

SELECT COUNT(id) countnum,datename(weekday, ADDTIME) AS datename FROM freecms_info i
GROUP BY datename(weekday, ADDTIME)
